product_description: PINATA'S ASADA SEASONING (SEA-164), Net Weight XXXX Lbs. -- FIRST SPICE MIXING COMPANY LONG ISLAND CITY, N.Y. ---  INGREDIENTS: SALT, SPICES, SUGAR, CITRIC ACID, DEHYDRATED GARLIC, PAPRIKA, NATURAL SMOKE, OIL OF LIME. --- The % of cumin used in the finished seasoning mix is 3.30%.  --- The affected lot was shipped on 10/21/14.
reason_for_recall: Firm was notified by immediate supplier that certain lots of  ground cumin may have been contaminated with peanut protein which is not declared on the label.
